author: Retro Game Corps
description:
Valve dropped some big hardware announcements today.  These are exciting in their own right, but also have BIG implications for living room emulation and Android handhelds in the future.  Let's discuss!

Valve hardware: https://store.steampowered.com/sale/hardware
PC Gamer article: https://www.pcgamer.com/hardware/vr-hardware/steamos-launching-for-arm-fex-translation-layer/

Ways to support this channel:
RGC merch: https://store.retrogamecorps.com
Stickers and magnets: https://www.ebay.com/str/retrogamecorpscharitystore
YT channel membership: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoZQiN0o7f36H7PaW4fVhFw/join
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/retrogamecorps
Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/retrogamecorps

Timestamps:
00:00 introduction
00:38 Steam Controller
01:44 Steam Machine
02:53 emulation console
06:17 Steam Frame
07:31 FEX and Proton for ARM
10:15 summary and conclusion

Find me on Discord! https://discord.gg/retrohandhelds

Theme song written by Jim Gray of Our Ghosts:
https://ourghosts.bandc
title: Valve is Pushing Emulation Further (Again)

author: Retro Game Corps
description:
Sometimes less is more.  In this video I'll show you how to make a super clean OS experience that focuses on only a few games -- and no more.  My goal is to create such a fine-tuned experience that you'll actually play through your games instead of scrolling.

Written guide: https://retrogamecorps.com/2025/10/24/minui-starter-guide/

Some recommended handhelds:
Miyoo Mini Flip: https://youtu.be/WYeC5WJv_zg
Anbernic RG*XX devices: https://youtu.be/4_zMdyCjKu4
TrimUI Brick: https://youtu.be/F1fHemFCi3I

Accessories: 
microSD card: https://amzn.to/3JF0tYp
microSD card reader: https://amzn.to/47DpOLz

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/retrogamecorps
Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/retrogamecorps

02:15 tools and accessories
03:19 initial
title: You Should Try This "Five Game Handheld"
